area: For Coastal areas up to 60 nautical miles from Lerwick, Shetland (18)
warning: Large area of low pressure to the south of Iceland will maintain a south to southeast flow across Shetland Waters for bulk of period. Small developing low tracking north reaching far west of area by Friday evening.

outlook.wind: Southeasterly, becoming cyclonic later in far west, 3 or 4, increasing 5 to 7 later in east
